column2: Add harvey to the list of OSes it can deal with
Find where runtime checks for the string Plan 9 and check for harvey too.
but it can not be automated. Let's get /dev/urandom and avoid the bullshit we're seeing in places
For all non-z* files that are *plan9.go copy to *harvey.go
For all build constraints in *harvey.go that are plan 9 change to harvey
For all *Plan9.s instead use the corresponding linux files.
Find all other files that depend on plan 9 and add harvey
Figure out how to generate files for z*.go
action (ignore/add harvey to build/fix/copy and rename)
